author: remm
msg: Fix apparent edge cases with handlers (partial ones for byte[]), decoders (should be passed on to handlers) and encoders (byte[] does not need a mandatory encoder).

author: fmeschbe
msg: SLING-4206 Refactor Sightly and Sightly JS
Applying patch by Radu Cotescu (thank you very much)

author: markt
msg: Page imports need to be visible to EL
JSPs can import classes that EL is not permitted to resolve. Ensure the ELException is only thrown on resolution, not import.
